ComicInfo.Title: Mega-City Manhunt, Part 3: Citizens On Patrol
ComicInfo.Summary:
A frantic Chief Justice Cal resorts to drastic measures to capture the fugitive Judge Dredd–deputizing every single citizen as a street judge for a 24 hour period! The citizen-judge who takes down Dredd will win cold hard cash, free healthcare for life, and his/her own reality show. But the plan breaks down when too many citizens take the law into their own hands…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Mark Torres | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Xurxo Penalta | 2 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Chief Judge Cal, Judge Anderson, Judge Dredd
ComicInfo.Teams: Judges of Mega-City One, Special Judicial Squad
